plot: Audie Murphy, an actor soon to appear in a film based on his World War II heroics, meets several other actors in a bank where they discuss the merits of purchasing U.S. savings bonds using payroll deductions.
title: Medal of Honor
plot_es: Audie Murphy, an actor soon to appear in a film based on his World War II heroics, meets several other actors in a bank where they discuss the merits of purchasing U.S. savings bonds using payroll deductions.
plot_en: Audie Murphy, an actor soon to appear in a film based on his World War II heroics, meets several other actors in a bank where they discuss the merits of purchasing U.S. savings bonds using payroll deductions.
